title: Drawing, "Design for Soup Plate, Dinner Plate, Fruit Plate", ca. 1926
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite above lower left and lower right corners:  August 18, 1926/Approved Agnes Miles Carpenter; lower left:  Soup-Plate/Austr. S. 14-; lower center:  Dinner-Plate/Austr?. 15-/larger?/A.M.C.
description: Designs for soup plate ( for 1958-98-13); for dinner plate (1958-98-12b) and for fruit plate (for 1958-98-12a).

exhibitions.title: Glass of the Avant-Garde: From Vienna Secession to Bauhaus

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Design for Soup Plate, Dinner Plate, Fruit Plate", ca. 1926.
ca. 1926. Graphite on tracing paper, lined. Gift of Frederick G. Weisser. 1958-77-3.
